\chapter{Documentation for the simulation configuration file of the same name}
\hypertarget{md_sim__config}{}\label{md_sim__config}\index{Documentation for the simulation configuration file of the same name@{Documentation for the simulation configuration file of the same name}}
\label{md_sim__config_autotoc_md0}%
\Hypertarget{md_sim__config_autotoc_md0}%

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item \href{sim_config.json}{\texttt{ Simulation Configuration File}}
\item Latest version supported\+: v.\+0.\+1
\end{DoxyItemize}\hypertarget{md_sim__config_autotoc_md1}{}\doxysection{\texorpdfstring{Simulation Configuration File}{Simulation Configuration File}}\label{md_sim__config_autotoc_md1}

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item version\+: string
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item version of the simulation configuration file
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item length\+\_\+unit\+: string
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item length unit of the simulation (e.\+g. nm, um, mm)
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item space\+\_\+unit\+: string
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item space unit of the simulation (this is just pixel, should not change)
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item time\+\_\+unit\+: string
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item time unit of the simulation (e.\+g. s, ms, us)
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item intensity\+\_\+unit\+: string
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item intensity unit of the simulation (AUD only supported)
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item diffusion\+\_\+unit\+: string
\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item diffusion unit of the simulation (e.\+g. um\texorpdfstring{$^\wedge$}{\string^}2/s, mm\texorpdfstring{$^\wedge$}{\string^}2/s)
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Cell\+\_\+\+Parameters\+: dict ~\newline

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item cell\+\_\+space\+: 2D array (units of space\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item cell\+\_\+space\mbox{[}0\mbox{]}\+: x coordinates of the cell space (min, max)
\item cell\+\_\+space\mbox{[}1\mbox{]}\+: y coordinates of the cell space (min, max)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item cell\+\_\+axial\+\_\+radius\+: float (units of space\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item The distance from z=0 in either direction that the cell extends
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item number\+\_\+of\+\_\+cells\+: int
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item number of cells to simulate (if more than 1 hen all are simulated in one folder defined by the output\+\_\+path)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Track\+\_\+\+Parameters\+: dict ~\newline

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item num\+\_\+tracks\+: int
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item number of tracks to simulate
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item track\+\_\+type\+: string
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item type of track to simulate ("{}fbm"{})
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item track\+\_\+length\+\_\+mean\+: int (frames)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item mean length of the track
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item track\+\_\+distribution\+: string
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item distribution of the track lengths ("{}exponential"{},"{}constant"{})
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item diffusion\+\_\+coefficient\+: list of floats (units of diffusion\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item diffusion coefficient of the track, the length of the list is the unique type of diffusion coefficients
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item diffusion\+\_\+track\+\_\+amount\+: list of floats
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item Only viable if allow\+\_\+transition\+\_\+probability is False
\item length is the total number of diffusion coefficients
\item each element is the probability of the track having the diffusion coefficient at the same index in the diffusion\+\_\+coefficient list (add up to 1.\+0)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item hurst\+\_\+expontent\+: list of floats
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item hurst exponent of the track, the length of the list is the unique type of hurst exponents
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item hurst\+\_\+track\+\_\+amount\+: list of floats
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item Only viable if allow\+\_\+transition\+\_\+probability is False
\item length is the total number of hurst exponents
\item each element is the probability of the track having the hurst exponent at the same index in the hurst\+\_\+exponent list (add up to 1.\+0)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item allow\+\_\+transition\+\_\+probability\+: bool
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item whether to allow transition probabilities between different diffusion coefficients and hurst exponents within a track
\item if false, the track will have a single diffusion coefficient and hurst exponent
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item transition\+\_\+matrix\+\_\+time\+\_\+step\+: int
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item time step at which the diffusion and hurst exponent transition matrices are supplied in the following parameters
\item the units are in time\+\_\+unit (so 100 ms would be 100)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item diffusion\+\_\+transition\+\_\+matrix\+: 2D array (discrete state probabilitiy at the transition\+\_\+matrix\+\_\+time\+\_\+step = dt)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item transition matrix between different diffusion coefficients
\item rows are the current diffusion coefficient
\item columns are the next diffusion coefficient
\item rows must sum to 1.\+0
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item hurst\+\_\+transition\+\_\+matrix\+: 2D array (discrete state probabilitiy at the transition\+\_\+matrix\+\_\+time\+\_\+step = dt)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item transition matrix between different hurst exponents
\item rows are the current hurst exponent
\item columns are the next hurst exponent
\item rows must sum to 1.\+0
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item state\+\_\+probability\+\_\+diffusion\+: 1D array (probability)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item probability of a track being in a certain diffusion coefficient state
\item length is the number of unique diffusion coefficients
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item state\+\_\+probability\+\_\+hurst\+: 1D array (probability)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item probability of a track being in a certain hurst exponent state
\item length is the number of unique hurst exponents
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Global\+\_\+\+Parameters\+: dict ~\newline

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item field\+\_\+of\+\_\+view\+\_\+dim\+: 1D array (units of space\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item field of view dimensions (x,y (pixels))
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item frame\+\_\+count\+: int
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item number of frames to simulate
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item exposure\+\_\+time\+: float or int (units of time\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item exposure time of the camera
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item interval\+\_\+time\+: float or int (units of time\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item time between frames that the camera is on
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item oversample\+\_\+motion\+\_\+time\+: float or int (units of time\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item oversampling the motion for motion blur
\item if oversample\+\_\+motion\+\_\+time == frame\+\_\+time == exposure\+\_\+time, then there is no motion blur
\item cannot be greater than frame\+\_\+time or exposure\+\_\+time
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item pixel\+\_\+size\+: float (units of length\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item size of the pixel
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item axial\+\_\+detection\+\_\+range\+: float (units of length\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item from z=0, the distance in either direction that the camera can detect a single molecule excitation
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item base\+\_\+noise\+: float (units of intensity\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item base noise of the camera (offset)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item point\+\_\+intensity\+: float (units of intensity\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item intensity of a single molecule excitation
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item psf\+\_\+sigma\+: float (units of length\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item size of the psf (assumed to be gaussian)
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item axial\+\_\+function\+: string ("{}exponential"{},"{}ones"{}(no effect))
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item function used to determine how the intensity of the single molecule changes with z
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Condenstate\+\_\+\+Parameters\+: dict ~\newline

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item initial\+\_\+centers\+: 2D array (units of space\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item initial centers of the condensates
\item \mbox{[}x,y,z\mbox{]} coordinates per row
\item number of rows is the number of condensates
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item initial\+\_\+scale\+: 1D (units of space\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item initial radius of the condensates
\item number of elements is the number of condensates
\item must be the same length as initial\+\_\+centers
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item diffusion\+\_\+coefficient\+: 1D array (units of diffusion\+\_\+unit)
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item diffusion coefficient of the condensates
\item number of elements is the number of condensates
\item must be the same length as initial\+\_\+centers
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item hurst\+\_\+exponent\+: 1D array
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item hurst exponent of the condensates
\item number of elements is the number of condensates
\item must be the same length as initial\+\_\+centers
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item density\+\_\+dif\+: float
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item density difference between the condensates and the rest of the cell
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\end{DoxyItemize}
\item Output\+\_\+\+Parameters\+: dict ~\newline

\begin{DoxyItemize}
\item output\+\_\+path\+: string
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item path to save the output, directory
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item output\+\_\+name\+: string
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item name of the output file \texorpdfstring{$\ast$}{*}subsegment\+\_\+type\+: string
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item function used to do projections ("{}mean"{},"{}max"{},"{}sum"{})
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\item subsegment\+\_\+number\+: int
\begin{DoxyEnumerate}
\item number of subsegments to divide the cell frames into
\item if total movie is 500 frames and this is 5 then there will be 100 frames per subsegment and 5 subsegments in total
\item Make sure that the total number of frames is divisible by the number of subsegments (modulus is 0) 
\end{DoxyEnumerate}
\end{DoxyItemize}
\end{DoxyItemize}
